response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exceptional opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled quality and benefits at an attractive cost. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
